name: Together (itch) (Kulfi13)
description:
This is my first time in a game jam, and I have incorporated the theme by setting the main goal of the game to be joined together. 

You can add forces to two dots in the game to make them touch. You have limited turns, and I think the levels turned out a bit difficult, so have fun with the challenge!

Controls 

(I'm writing them here in case you don't get the UI, which actually is very intuitive      - The UX designer in me)

Use the panels to set a force and direction for the dots. There are two dots and two panels for them respectively. 

Click on execute to execute that command. You have a limited number of turns for this.

You can select multiple arrows at the same time. This allows for diagonal jumps. However selecting both right and left arrows will nullify the effect and the dot will not move.

Hints for if you get stuck on anything because I might not be as good of a level designer as I think: 

1. You can execute the same moves in quick succession to get a large boost

2. You can execute moves in the air, wherever you are, no matter what velocity the dots are at

3.  Not all parts of a level are meant to be used, some of them are soft locks and you have to reset them

I hope you like my game

ps I accidentally uploaded the screenshots twice, idk how to remove them sry
